part.title: Above Are the Title and Author

sect1.title: Portability
sect1.para: We use XML as a way to send information in a universal, simple format which can be transfered between many platforms and many applications.

sect1.title: Documentation
sect1.para: We use XML to mark-up text, or document what internal phrases are so anyone can parse the information when they know the format.

sect1.title: Web Development
sect1.para: Using XML to hold a document allows one to edit the display of the document in a web page independently of the actual data as long as the XML specs/format are adhered to.
